english.segment1: Theres a kind of way who love it when I fall, loves it when I bleed, loves to take control. Must she look that way, take me to the ground, I become the ground, we become the ground. Her dress becomes my thoughts. Her thoughts become a plot. Her touch becomes my fate. Can mercy find a way?. Can mercy find a way?
english.segment2: Find me. An empty me. Well I like you that way. But I cannot stay, Find me. A broken me. Well I like her that way, but I will not stay
english.segment3: Theres a certain pain that separates the call, Loves to see me bleed, loves to take control, Must she look that way, take me to the ground, I become the ground, we become the ground. Her dress becomes my thoughts. Her thoughts become a plot. Her touch becomes my fate. Can mercy find a way?. Can mercy find a way?
english.segment4: Find me. An empty me. Well I like you that way but I cannot stay, Find me. A broken me. Well I like her that way but I will not stay.
english.segment5: Free . Theres a kind of way who love it when I fall. Loves it when I bleed, loves to take control
